data.text:
When stopping by the Training Course today, 
I happened to spot Silence Suzuka running.
data.processed:
󠁿When stopping by the Training Course today, 
󠁿I happened to spot Silence Suzuka running.

data.text:
Since her trainer isn't here, is she doing her training 
independently? Thinking that, I ended up watching over her.
data.processed:
󠁿Since her trainer isn't here, is she doing her training 
󠁿independently? Thinking that, I ended up watching over her.

data.text: Haaa… haa…Ah?!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Haaa… haa…Ah?!

data.text:
When Silence Suzuka stumbled, I panicked and rushed 
to her. Don't tell me she's injured…!
data.processed:
󠁿When Silence Suzuka stumbled, I panicked and rushed 
󠁿to her. Don't tell me she's injured…!

data.text:
Ah… S-sorry. It's nothing, I'm fine. It's 
just… my feet feel a little heavy…
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: Are you feeling out of sorts…?
Are you feeling out of sorts…?

data.processed:
󠁿Ah… S-sorry. It's nothing, I'm fine. It's 
󠁿just… my feet feel a little heavy…

data.text: Out of sorts… could that be it?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Out of sorts… could that be it?

data.text: …something's wrong with me. Ever since that mock race.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…something's wrong with me. Ever since that mock race.

data.text:
My legs feel heavy, as if they've been chained. As I keep 
running, eventually my vision starts to darken…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿My legs feel heavy, as if they've been chained. As I keep 
󠁿running, eventually my vision starts to darken…

data.text:
Pushing myself…? I'm not doing that. 
Normally, I could keep on running.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Pushing myself…? I'm not doing that. 
󠁿Normally, I could keep on running.

data.text: …I've always been running. Always. Running is everything to me.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…I've always been running. Always. Running is everything to me.

data.text:
However, now… what should I do? This is 
the first time I've ever felt like this.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿However, now… what should I do? This is 
󠁿the first time I've ever felt like this.

data.text:
I feel like 'I don't want to run anymore'… 
This is… the first time…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿I feel like 'I don't want to run anymore'… 
󠁿This is… the first time…

data.text:
It seems like she's really suffering. Is 
there anything I can do for her…?
data.processed:
󠁿It seems like she's really suffering. Is 
󠁿there anything I can do for her…?

data.text:
For this girl that's lost sight of the excitement 
of running, is there anything?
data.processed:
󠁿For this girl that's lost sight of the excitement 
󠁿of running, is there anything?

data.text: Huuu… Yeah… running at night is great, it's nice and quiet
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Huuu… Yeah… running at night is great, it's nice and quiet

data.text:
Now that I think about it, doesn't it seem 
like the stars are brighter tonight?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Now that I think about it, doesn't it seem 
󠁿like the stars are brighter tonight?

data.text: …hehe. This scenery, I have it all to myself
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…hehe. This scenery, I have it all to myself

data.text:
That reminds me, at that time… when Silence Suzuka was happily 
running, she was also enjoying the scenery around her.
data.processed:
󠁿That reminds me, at that time… when Silence Suzuka was happily 
󠁿running, she was also enjoying the scenery around her.

data.text: If that's the case…

choices.text: For a change of pace, how about running in a different location?
choices.processed: <size=25>For a change of pace, how about running in a different location?</size>

choices.text: For a change of pace, how about running in a different location?
choices.processed: <size=25>For a change of pace, how about running in a different location?</size>

data.processed: 󠁿If that's the case…

data.text: A different location…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: Yeah, like a place with beautiful scenery
choices.processed: <size=41>Yeah, like a place with beautiful scenery</size>

data.processed: 󠁿A different location…?

data.text: Scenery…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Scenery…

data.text:
But, there isn't a place like that near school. 
I've visited most of the area on my runs…
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: In that case, I'll show you
In that case, I'll show you

data.processed:
󠁿But, there isn't a place like that near school. 
󠁿I've visited most of the area on my runs…

data.text: …is that okay?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…is that okay?

data.text:
I led Silence Suzuka to a place with beautiful scenery where she 
could run to her heart's content.
data.processed:
󠁿I led Silence Suzuka to a place with beautiful scenery where she 
󠁿could run to her heart's content.

data.text: Wow…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Wow…

data.text:
While we were on the train, the sky seems to have cleared up. 
It's all green and bathed in sunlight… beautiful…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿While we were on the train, the sky seems to have cleared up. 
󠁿It's all green and bathed in sunlight… beautiful…

data.text: That aside, this path… where does it lead…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: How about running and finding out?
How about running and finding out?

data.processed: 󠁿That aside, this path… where does it lead…?

data.text: Ah…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Ah…

data.text: …That's right. I'll go and see.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…That's right. I'll go and see.

data.text: Haa, haa, haa… Fuuu.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Haa, haa, haa… Fuuu.

data.text: (My feet still feel a little heavy… but…)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿(My feet still feel a little heavy… but…)

data.text: …A nice breeze. It feels cool…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…A nice breeze. It feels cool…

data.text: …Yeah. Let's run a little more.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…Yeah. Let's run a little more.

data.text: Haa, haa, haa…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Haa, haa, haa…

data.text:
(The feeling of both feet kicking the ground… 
my body is hot, the breeze is cool…)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿(The feeling of both feet kicking the ground… 
󠁿my body is hot, the breeze is cool…)

data.text:
(That's right. If I run like this, if I keep 
running like this, then eventually-)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿(That's right. If I run like this, if I keep 
󠁿running like this, then eventually-)

data.text: Haa, haaa…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Haa, haaa…!

data.text: (-I'll finally reach that quiet scenery)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿(-I'll finally reach that quiet scenery)

data.text:
(With only the sound of the wind and my beating heart. With 
nobody around, a whole new… world just for me…!)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿(With only the sound of the wind and my beating heart. With 
󠁿nobody around, a whole new… world just for me…!)

data.text: That's right, I…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿That's right, I…!

data.text: Haa, haa… haaaaaaauu…Fuuu.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Haa, haa… haaaaaaauu…Fuuu.

data.text: …Yes, I am. I ran my heart out, until it emptied my mind.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…Yes, I am. I ran my heart out, until it emptied my mind.

data.text: Because of that…I remembered.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Because of that…I remembered.

data.text:
When I was little and just ran and ran, one day, 
my parents recommended I enter a race.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿When I was little and just ran and ran, one day, 
󠁿my parents recommended I enter a race.

data.text:
I entered the race thinking 'As long as I get 
to run'. At first… it was very stressful
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿I entered the race thinking 'As long as I get 
󠁿to run'. At first… it was very stressful

data.text: Being surrounded by so many… it was noisy, and uncomfortable.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Being surrounded by so many… it was noisy, and uncomfortable.

data.text:
That's why… I thought I should go to a place 
where nobody was, and went out in front.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿That's why… I thought I should go to a place 
󠁿where nobody was, and went out in front.

data.text:
Yes. I thought 'I have to get to a place that nobody can follow'. 
When I ran my hardest, suddenly my eyes were opened.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Yes. I thought 'I have to get to a place that nobody can follow'. 
󠁿When I ran my hardest, suddenly my eyes were opened.

data.text: It became quiet… I reached that scenery with nobody around.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿It became quiet… I reached that scenery with nobody around.

data.text: …I want to run out in front.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…I want to run out in front.

data.text:
Once more, I want to reach that place again and again. These 
feelings alone…I won't concede…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Once more, I want to reach that place again and again. These 
󠁿feelings alone…I won't concede…!

data.text:
I think I want to speak with my trainer now. 
To say "I can't run without Escaping".
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿I think I want to speak with my trainer now. 
󠁿To say "I can't run without Escaping".

data.text: Um, and so… um.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Um, and so… um.

data.text:
…do you think you can come with me? Speaking 
isn't one of my strong points…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿…do you think you can come with me? Speaking 
󠁿isn't one of my strong points…

data.text: W-would that be okay…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿W-would that be okay…?

data.text: Let's return to school, and talk to Silence Suzuka's trainer…!
data.processed: 󠁿Let's return to school, and talk to Silence Suzuka's trainer…!
